title: Transport Test Data Schema
description: The Transport Test is to assess the properties of the fluid relevant to transportation. A series of test steps for properties (such as viscosity, density, etc.) can be defined.

SamplesAnalysisID.title: Samples Analysis ID
SamplesAnalysisID.description: The OSDU Identifier for this SamplesAnalysis.

SampleID.title: Sample ID
SampleID.description: The OSDU Identifier for the Sample associated with this analysis.

TestNumber.title: Test Number
TestNumber.description: A number for this test for purposes of e.g., tracking lab sequence.

ReservoirPressure.title: Reservoir Pressure
ReservoirPressure.description: The pressure conditions of the reservoir where the sample was collected.

ViscosityMethodID.title: Viscosity Method ID
ViscosityMethodID.description: Identifier for the method by which viscosity was measured or calculated.

TestSteps.title: Test Steps
TestSteps.description: The test steps for this viscosity test.

items.title: Test Steps
items.description: The test steps for this viscosity test.

StepNumber.title: Step Number
StepNumber.description: Internal step number which identifies the sequence of step in transport test measurements.

StepPressure.title: Step Pressure
StepPressure.description: The pressure condition recorded at this test step.

StepTemperature.title: Step Temperature
StepTemperature.description: The temperature recorded at this test step.

OilViscosity.title: Oil Viscosity
OilViscosity.description: A measure of a fluid’s internal resistance to flow.

GasViscosity.title: Gas Viscosity
GasViscosity.description: A measure of a fluid’s internal resistance to flow.

FluidPhasesPresentID.title: Fluid Phases Present ID
FluidPhasesPresentID.description: Identifies the phases of fluid present in the sample, e.g. SeparatorLiquid, FlashedOil, OilWithMud, Gas, ReservoirFluid (references FluidPhasesPresent).

SaturationPressure.title: Saturation Pressure
SaturationPressure.description: The saturation (or bubble point) pressure at the Step Temperature in this test step.

AssociatedAnalysisTypeID.title: Associated Analysis Type ID
AssociatedAnalysisTypeID.description: The type of flash process through which the gas and liquid phases are separated, e.g. Differential Liberation, Constant Composition Expansion, Constant Volume Depletion, Atmospheric Flash.
